snippet.title: Bad Monday Simulator - Gameplay
snippet.description:
Prepare to battle against the fusion of Sans and Garfield - Sansfield. 
Play Bad Monday Simulator for free: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/845834
SUB FOR MORE!👉 http://bit.ly/subscribeLUMPY 👈
🔶The Lumpy PATREON: https://patreon.com/LumpyTouch 
🦆Follow me on TWITTER: https://twitter.com/LumpyTouch
📷The Lumpy INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/lumpytouch
📺Art Stream on TWITCH: https://www.twitch.tv/lumpytouch

Bad Monday Simulator is the ultimate Undertale fangame! You play as Nermal, who faces off against Sansfield - the fusion of Sans and Garfield. It's a battle for survival. But is Sansfield a villain? Or is he the last hope against an incredible darkness...

Find out in 3 additional lore videos, releasing alongside Bad Monday Simulator!

Bad Monday Simulator features 3 difficulty settings and SIX different endings! Though good luck finding someone who can beat the game on Monday Mode...

Experience it yourself. Play Bad Monday Simulator.
Newgrounds link: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/845834
itch.io link: https://lumpytouch.itch.io/bad-monday-simulator

Bad Monday Simulator is drawn by myself, 
programmed by Spasco https://twitter.com/Spasco_
and has music by Polarial https://soundcloud.com/polarialmusic

Special thanks to my Patreon Pals, whose support helped me pay for this fun fangame. Here's the VIPs: https://imgur.com/a/30LFOUf

#undertale #sansfield #badmondaysim
